name: .PSPD File Extension
summary: Learn about .PSPD files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Project file created by Roxio PhotoSuite version 5, a program used to turn digital photos into greeting cards, invitations, and posters; contains references to digital photo files as well as image edits, text, and layout formatting; used to save and load a PhotoSuite project.

content: NOTE: PSPD files were used by older versions of Roxio PhotoSuite. They have now been replaced by .DMSP files in Roxio Creator, which now includes PhotoSuite as part of its multimedia package.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
